headline: FIFA 2026 World Cup to drive ’unprecedented’ attention to US live events
summary: Investing.com -- Bernstein believes 2026 will mark a big year for U.S. live entertainment as the broker expects the upcoming FIFA World Cup to be “a landmark catalyst” for global attention and engagement.
